title: Only Read the Fine Print
description: We all hope that our children don’t make the same mistakes we did. But life doesn't come with an owner’s manual, so how can they avoid them?Only Read the Fine Print is one man’s attempt to share life’s most important lessons with his children. Short, light-hearted, and easy to read, this collection of insights, ideas, and anecdotes shares important lessons quickly and casually. One part manifesto and one part advice column, there is something inside for children of all ages.
author: Thomas  Briggs
